movies.title: The Tree of Life
movies.description: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: The Witch
movies.description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
